message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable considering the time pressure.
Your offer was a bit greedy Alice. Time is running out for both of us, so let's make it a bit more even.
Bob, my turn and the clock is ticking.  I'll take a little less this round, but we need to settle this soon.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out.  Take this offer and let's be done with it.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. 50/50, take it or leave it.
